fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 102, 1/F., CITYPLAZA, 18 TAIKOO SHING ROAD, TAIKOO SHING, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港太古城太古城道18號 太古城中心1樓102號舖

result.adr_address: Shop 102, 1/F, Phase 2, Cityplaza, 18 Tai Koo Shing Rd, Tai Koo, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop 102, 1/F, Phase 2, Cityplaza, 18 Tai Koo Shing Rd, Tai Koo, Hong Kong
result.name: The Night Market

reviews.text:
Went there last Saturday. Ordered some second round dishes and a amber of staff failed to register into their system. The dishes of course didn't come and we waited for a while for like 20 mins and thrn checked with a mid aged male staff, who went to the system casually and then just lied to us saying the second round dishes would take longer time. So happens I say very close to the system and saw none of those dishes were registered and discovered that the staff was just too lazy and lied. I told them straight away and printed to the screen saying no the dishes were missing. Another female staff then came and placed the order again. 

Very disappointing experience and another story how poor staff can ruin the whole impression of a decent restaurant. 

Revised my rating to 3 stars from 4 due to this.

Food was still with good quality and value.

Fairly enjoyable food and the staff were pretty nice. Set lunches are a good deal and I'd try again. I didn't make a great choice but the people I went with really liked. Second time and had the Dan dan men with non spicy chili wonton. Dan Dan men also not spicy and very very oily. I couldn’t drink the soup at all. All the food here seems very oily and fatty so if that’s your thing, you’ll probably like. Everything well cooked and presentation fine.
Good food. Reasonable price. Good seating. But cannot understand why they cannot provide no-ice drinks, when menu gives a “0 冰” option. I had to scoop out the ice myself and it tastes fine.
Good food in general. Bubble tea is also great. Lunch sets are good value for this area.

Delicious 😋 - no MSG, 足料, good service (offered warm water and put down toothpicks without asking) and not too pricey, still open on CNY and located near the ice skiing rink. Handmade noodles 彈牙👍🏻 Some bar table seats so perhaps easy for single guests during rush hours too😊

result.name: The Night Market

reviews.text: 不好吃吖☹️
菜式不算太地道，但適合港人口味。不時增改菜式，雖然不是每次都成功，但勝在有誠意，值得支持！比對現時的熱厨房？真令人齒冷！連洗米煮飯都未識就去做主厨，話自己好煮得！......離題了，罪過！罪過！

標榜台灣料理。先講好的: 店面新淨企理，整潔，店員有禮貌，服務殷勤，上菜埋單時間合理。碟頭份量一般，但商場舖位，很難苛求。不過，五樣食物全部不突出，整體在水準以下。先講麻油雞，用雪雞已經在預期之內，但明明個汁黃色，又有好多薑片，叫做麻油雞，但竟然是沒有任何味道似的！？係真的淡而無味，當然雞件更是全不入味了，0粒星。石鍋菜飯，不行，飯是濕濕的，黏在一起，1粒星。燒仙草，似仙草粉加熱水開，質地麻麻。炒新竹米粉算乾身不太油膩、珍珠奶茶還可。整體上，食物唔得，冇下次。

Went there last Saturday. Ordered some second round dishes and a amber of staff failed to register into their system. The dishes of course didn't come and we waited for a while for like 20 mins and thrn checked with a mid aged male staff, who went to the system casually and then just lied to us saying the second round dishes would take longer time. So happens I say very close to the system and saw none of those dishes were registered and discovered that the staff was just too lazy and lied. I told them straight away and printed to the screen saying no the dishes were missing. Another female staff then came and placed the order again. 

Very disappointing experience and another story how poor staff can ruin the whole impression of a decent restaurant. 

Revised my rating to 3 stars from 4 due to this.

Food was still with good quality and value.

Fairly enjoyable food and the staff were pretty nice. Set lunches are a good deal and I'd try again. I didn't make a great choice but the people I went with really liked. Second time and had the Dan dan men with non spicy chili wonton. Dan Dan men also not spicy and very very oily. I couldn’t drink the soup at all. All the food here seems very oily and fatty so if that’s your thing, you’ll probably like. Everything well cooked and presentation fine.
